摠字的基本解释

摠
zǒng
同“总”。

摠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zǒng］
［《廣韻》作孔切，上董，精。］
亦作“捴1”。亦作“搃1”。亦作“摠1”。亦作“総1”。亦作“緫1”。亦作“縂1”。“总1”的繁体字。
(1)聚合；汇集。
(2)谓聚禾稿成束。
(3)束发。亦指束发之带。
(4)结；系。
(5)持。
(6)总括；概括。
(7)总揽。
(8)统领；统率。
(9)众人。
(10)古代车马之饰。
(11)皆；都。
(12)大概。
(13)老是；一直。
(14)总归；毕竟。
(15)通“縱”。释放。
(16)通“縱”。纵然；即使。
[②]［zōng］
［《集韻》祖叢切，平東，精。］
亦作“緫2”。通“緵1”。亦作“縂2”。
丝数名。古以丝八十根为“總”。
[③]［cōng］
［《集韻》麤叢切，平東，清。］
亦作“緫3”。亦作“縂3”。
(1)通“繱”。绢的一种。
(2)通“怱”。参见“總3至”。
(3)通“葱”。参见“總3極”。

摠字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　摠； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页450第10
【唐韻】【正韻】作孔切【集韻】【韻會】祖動切，?與總同。本作?。【玉篇】將領也，合也。【廣韻】聚束也，皆也，衆也。　又【六書故】兼持也。【禮·樂記】冕而摠千。　又結也。【屈原·離騷】摠余轡乎扶桑。或作揔。互見揔字註。俗作捴摠，非。摠字从囙作。

摠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
摠字的起名意思

暂无。

general
zǒng
Same as "total".
general
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zǒng］
["Guangyun" made Kongqie, Shangdong, Jing. ]
Also known as "Bao 1". Also known as "pin 1". Also known as "摠1". Also known as "総1". Also known as "Long 1". Also called "total 1". Traditional characters of "总1".
(1) Aggregation; Collection.
(2) It is said that Juhe drafts are bundled.
(3) Bunch hair. Also refers to the band of hair.
(4) Knot; tie.
(5) Hold.
(6) Summarize; generalize.
(7) Overview.
(8) Command; Command.
(9) Everyone.
(10) The decoration of ancient carriages and horses.
(11) All; all.
(12) Probably.
(13) Always; always.
(14) Anyway; after all.
(15) Through "vertical". freed.
(16) Through "vertical". Even though; even though.
[②]［zōng］
["Jiyun" Zu Congqie, Pingdong, Jing. ]
Also known as "Long 2". Link "緵1". Also known as "Total 2".
Number of silk names. In ancient times, 80 roots of silk were used as the "total".
[③] [cōng]
["Ji Yun" rough cut, Pingdong, Qing. ]
Also known as "Long 3". Also known as "Total 3".
(1) Through "繱". A kind of silk.
(2) Through "hurried". See "Total 3 to".
(3) Pass "onion". See "Total 3 poles".
general
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　摠; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 450 No. 10
【Tang Yun】【Zheng Yun】make hole cut 【Ji Yun】【Rhyme will】The ancestor moves cut,? Same as the general. This work?. [Jade articles] Generals also, together. [Guang Yun] The bunch is also, everyone is also.　[Six Books and Gu] also hold both. 【Li·Le Ji】Mian and Qian Qian.　Knot again. 【Qu Yuan·Lisao】Fuyu's bridle is almost Fusang. Or make a joke. See each other's note. Popular as a mongoose, non. The word is made from choke.
